location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Deputy Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter concerns an application from Aga Mahomed Ismail Khan regarding the payment of his late father's pension. Includes various enclosures:A copy of a letter, dated 12 May 1811, from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay, to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Chief Secretary to the Governor General at Fort William.A copy of a letter, dated 10 May 1811, from John Elphinston, Accountant General, Bombay, to Warden.A copy of a letter, dated 1 April 1811, from John Kaye, Deputy Accountant General, to the Sub-Treasurer at Bombay.A copy of a letter, dated 7 June 1811, from Edmonstone to Warden.A copy of a letter, dated 13 September 1811, from Hugh George Macklin, Advocate General, Chambers Court House, to Warden.
